name: The Nouveau Image
description:
The Nouveau Image is a boutique firm that specializes in web marketing, consulting, event planning, branding, PR, creative and design. Our 360 degree personalized marketing will help your company to succeed and grow.
Our backgrounds include event planning, styling, editorial, interior design, web marketing/design, consulting, production, public relations, and social networking, just to name a few. We are here for you to utilize our skills.
